classification_data.text: LA SUSCRITA CONTADORA PÚBLICA DE QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S. CERTIFICA QUE: A la fecha de expedición de la presente certificación, QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S., identificada con el NIT No. 901.108.357-8, tiene un capital autorizado, suscrito y pagado de QUINIENTOS VEINTE MILLONES DE PESOS ($520.000.000.00), dividido en 5.200 acciones de valor nominal de $100.000 cada una con la siguiente participación: IDENTIFICACIÓN NOMBRE ACCIONISTAS NO. DE ACCIONES % PARTICIPACIÓN VALOR NOMINAL POR ACCIÓN $100.000 NACIONALIDAD DE LOS SOCIOS C.E 737708 MENDOZA CARRANZA JOSE CARLOS 5.200 100% 520.000.000 SALVADOREÑO TOTAL 5.200 100% 520.000.000 SANDRA MILENA BOLAÑOS BRAVO T.P 158280-T C.C 27.191.211 CONTADORA JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA C.E 737708 REPRESENTANTE LEGAL El presente certificado se expide a los 30 días del mes de Diciembre de 2022. content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step according to the classification workflow. 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** The document contains significant text in Spanish. It's a letterhead document from "QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S." with a certification by a public accountant (CONTADORA PÚBLICA). The document shows: - Company identification: QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S with NIT 901.108.357-8 - Capital information: authorized, subscribed and paid capital of 520,000,000 pesos - Share information: 5,200 shares of 100,000 pesos nominal value each - Shareholder composition showing JOSE CARLOS MENDOZA CARRANZA owns 5,200 shares (100% participation) - The document is signed by Sandra Milena Bolaños Bravo (accountant) and Jose Carlos Mendoza Carranza (legal representative) - Date: December 30, 2022 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - Not BLANK: has significant content - Not LINK_ONLY: no hyperlinks/URLs redirecting elsewhere 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** What is the main purpose of this document? - This document certifies the shareholding composition of QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S. - It shows the percentage participation (100%), number of shares (5,200), and capital contribution (520,000,000 pesos) of the shareholder - The main function is to indicate the shareholding composition of the company This points to ACC (shareholding composition document). 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** - The document is issued by the company itself (QUIMEL INGENIERIA S.A.S.) through its public accountant - It's not issued by a tax authority (DIAN) -> not RUT/RUB indicative - It's not issued by a commercial registry authority (Chamber of Commerce) -> not CERL indicative - It's issued by a corporate entity showing its own shareholding structure -> ACC indicative 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** I confirm this is an ACC document based on key characteristics: - Directly demonstrates full ownership by a single shareholder - Provides precise financial details about share composition - Uses specific legal terminology related to corporate shareholding - Represents an internal corporate certification of ownership structure The document definitively falls under ACC classification, distinguishing itself from other document types by its focused presentation of company ownership details.
